channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: In for a Penny
channel.desc: Stephen Mulhern takes the show across the pond for a special long episode from Walt Disney World Resort in Florida with classic games and brand-new ones too.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shark! Celebrity Infested Waters
channel.desc: The qualified celebrity team members come face to face with 18-foot tiger sharks and find out if they can overcome their fear and learn to love these notorious predators. S1 Ep5.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
channel.desc: Fantasy film prequel starring Eddie Redmayne, 2016. A young wizard is embroiled in an incident in New York City involving the escape of some of his fantastic beasts.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? Celebrity Special
channel.desc: Comedian Jo Brand and TV presenter Dan Walker both have the chance to become the first-ever celebrity to win the jackpot, but will either succeed.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The 1% Club
channel.desc: Find out how clever you are - and if you could be in the top one per cent of the UK - as Lee Mack presents the ultimate leveller of a quiz show with a top prize of 100,000 pounds.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: One Night
channel.desc: Simone: The first episode of an Australian drama series. A wannabe writer's debut manuscript is about to be published, but it is soon clear that the story isn't exclusively hers. S1 Ep1.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Jonathan Ross Show
channel.desc: The guests featured with Jonathan in this show include Jack Black, Stormzy, Grace Jones, Steve Coogan, Emma Stone, Andy Serkis, Emma Thompson and Nile Rodgers. S2 Ep5.
